title: TOP
content:
[[div style="display: none;"]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:flopstyle]]
[[/div]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:y2k]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:pride-highlighter |inc-s9-lsb-alt= --]]]
[[module CSS]]
#header h1 span {
    color: transparent;
    text-shadow: none;
}
#page-title {
    display: none;
}
#header h1 span::before {
    font-family: "Microsoft Sans Serif";
    content: "TOP";
    color: #ffffff;
    text-shadow: 3px 3px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
}
#header h2 span::before {
    font-family: "Microsoft Sans Serif";
    content: 'welcome to hell.';
    color: #ffffff;
    text-shadow: none;
}
div.where a:hover::before{
    content: "> ";
}
.bigtext {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', sans-serif;
    font-weight: 700;
    color: #9977ee;
    font-size: 110%;
}
.bigtext a {
    color: #9977ee;
}
[[/module]]
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
------
[[=]]
[[collapsible show="CLICK HERE!" hide="or don't..."]]
[[/=]]
[[<]]
[[div class="report-box realistic-shadow"]]
++* CHECK OUT MY NEW STUFF!

* **SCP**
 * [[[SCP-7739]]] - Deerest God...
  * //"She also asked for something called a "Lego Batmobile", but I don't really think that's in my domain."//
* **TALE**
 * [[[Providence]]]
  * //One of the man's fingers, on the same hand as the thumb that the skink had tried to eat, twitched. Something that corpses were not supposed to do.//
* **OTHER**
 * [[[poi-complete-list|]]]
  * //ft. [[*user newnykacolaquantum]]//
[[/div]]
[[/<]]
[[/collapsible]]
------
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:turbo-vision blocks=-]]
[[tabview]]
[[tab Me!]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-block-peppo
|name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/top/top.jpg
|caption= Accurate Depiction of Top.
|width=300px
]]
me topdownunder. i am [[span class="bigtext"]]she/her[[/span]].

If for whatever reason you need to contact me, you can find me on:
* Discord
 * TopDownUnder
* Tumblr
 * [*https://t0pdownunder.tumblr.com/ t0pdownunder]
* Twitter
 * [*https://twitter.com/TopDownUnder @TopDownUnder]
* Bluesky
 * [*https://bsky.app/profile/topdownunder.bsky.social @topdownunder.bsky.social]
* Wikidot DM
 * [*http://www.wikidot.com/account/messages#/new/3253914 bing bong]
[[/tab]]
[[tab My Stuff!]]
[[div class="where"]]
[[div class="turbo-block bg-black text-white border-white" data-title="My Track Record"]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[div class="heading"]]
[[=]]
SCPs
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="turbo-block bg-white text-black border-black"]]
[[div class="turbo-block bg-black text-white"]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]ðŸ€[[/size]]
**[[[SCP-5723]]]**
[[size 75%]]Welcome to The Clubhouse[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
 I like the idea I put out with Frankfort Animation. I would love to further flesh that out and use them more.
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="heading"]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="turbo-block bg-white text-black border-black"]]
[[div class="turbo-block bg-green"]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]ðŸŒ±[[/size]]
**[[[SCP-6776]]]**
[[size 75%]]Reclamation[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
This was my entry for 6k and one of my favourite things I've written on the wiki. I definitely put the most effort into this one, and I want to believe it shows. It was a bit rushed for time towards the end (not the last one posted tho!), but it turned out pretty complete. I feel like I got more than enough crit on it, and it's polished enough.

I hope to reference this SCP a lot more in the future. I feel like there's still a lot more I could explore with it.
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="heading"]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="turbo-block bg-white text-black border-black"]]
[[div class="turbo-block bg-grey text-black"]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]ðŸ¦[[/size]]
**[[[SCP-6170]]]**
[[size 75%]]A Tale Of a God, and The Chaos Surrounding His Demise[[/size]]
[[size 75%]]COLLAB[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
My entry for Memecon 2021, done alongside [[*user Cole 13]]! It was really fun to write, and it was an idea I had been kicking around my head for a bit before the contest was announced, so it really felt nice finally getting it written down. Cole and I almost didn't get this done in time for Memecon. I think we only had 2 hours left when we posted it? We cut it really short lol, and as a result couldn't get a lot of crit before we posted. Regardless, I think the article turned out really well despite that, and I'm proud to say I made Harambe SCP.
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="heading"]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="turbo-block bg-white text-black border-black"]]
[[div class="turbo-block bg-grey text-black"]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]ðŸ¦…[[/size]]
**[[[SCP-359]]]**
[[size 75%]]The Hawk[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
A rewrite of the most downvoted^^*cough* -97 *cough*^^ SCP ever! I saw that it was in rewrite limbo for forever and was getting passed around like crazy. After finding out who had the rewrite permissions at the time and getting it from them, I got to work on it. I really like how it turned out, especially with the character of Gi-3 and hephasium.
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="heading"]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="turbo-block bg-white text-black border-black"]]
[[div class="turbo-block bg-orange"]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]ðŸ´[[/size]]
**[[[SCP-6821]]]**
[[size 75%]]//Mujeres con Cabezas de Caballo//[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
Written for Deptcon! Super fun to write and research for, as I mostly just pulled from stories my parents told me when I was younger. I plan to rewrite at least the latter half of it at some point, as it has potential to be so much more.
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="heading"]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="turbo-block bg-white text-black border-black"]]
[[div class="turbo-block bg-cyan"]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]ðŸ•›[[/size]]
**[[[SCP-6875]]]**
[[size 75%]]Paleolithic Containment Site[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
ooga booga! Originally wrote this as a sequel to 6776, but after some feedback I felt like it worked better as its own thing. I really like what I did with it and it was a ton of fun thinking of how cavemen would contain anomalies.
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="heading"]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="turbo-block bg-white text-black border-black"]]
[[div class="turbo-block bg-grey text-black"]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]ðŸ›£ï¸[[/size]]
**[[[SCP-7018]]]**
[[size 75%]]The Long Winding Road[[/size]]
[[size 75%]]COLLAB[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
My 7k entry, written with [[*user Cole 13]] and [[*user MetalRavioli]]. I love the character work that was done and I definitely want to write more of Ekene in the future, they're an interesting character.
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="heading"]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="turbo-block bg-white text-black border-black"]]
[[div class="turbo-block bg-green"]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]ðŸ¦Œ[[/size]]
**[[[SCP-7739]]]**
[[size 75%]]Deerest God...[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
Ahwi's such a cutie-patootie! Loved the dynamic between her and Nicole, as much as I would love to write more of them I think they're best kept alone.
[[/div]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[div class="heading"]]
[[=]]
TALES
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="turbo-block bg-white text-black border-black"]]
[[div class="turbo-block bg-yellow"]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]ðŸŒ¸[[/size]]
**[[[SOMETHING BEAUTIFUL]]]**
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
My first post on this site. I wrote it a year or so before I posted it on the main wiki, and it was supposed to be longer, with a friend of mine having planned to add her sections to the tale. However, that never came to be. Instead, I decided to post what was written onto the wiki!
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="heading"]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="turbo-block bg-white text-black border-black"]]
[[div class="turbo-block bg-red"]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]<3[[/size]]
**[[[ION X BUMARO FOREVURR]]]**
[[size 75%]]ðŸ”ž[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
This was my entry for the [[[an-incredibly-importanterest-announcement |Creck Fection Contest]]], and it somehow won. I wrote it in about 2 hours, and my only feedback on it was my partner (jokingly) saying it was awful. --Despite being a coldpost, it's currently my most upvoted article. Then again, it was April Fool's, so...-- 6776 beat it. Party at my house.
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="heading"]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="turbo-block bg-white text-black border-black"]]
[[div class="turbo-block bg-green"]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]ðŸŒ¿[[/size]]
**[[[the-old-hometown-looks-the-same| IT'S GOOD TO TOUCH THE GREEN, GREEN GRASS OF HOME]]]**
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
My Art Exchange for [[*user MetalRavioli]], who asked for a tale relating to one of their SCPs. I decided to retell the story that was told in [[[SCP-6773]]], but in Aces and Eight! I loved the idea to bits and //god// is it fun writing Western stuff.
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="heading"]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[div class="turbo-block bg-white text-black border-black"]]
[[div class="turbo-block bg-red"]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]ðŸª–[[/size]]
**[[[WAR MACHINE]]]**
[[size 75%]]COLLAB[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
An entry for Deptcon, co-written with [[*user MaxyFran73]]. The time period was really fun to work with and I had so much fun writing the scene of WTPD's titan destroying the base. It was also cool to see the beginnings of AWD, before Ezra drove it into the ground.
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="heading"]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="turbo-block bg-white text-black border-black"]]
[[div class="turbo-block bg-green"]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]ðŸª¦[[/size]]
**[[[PROVIDENCE]]]**
[[size 75%]]SEQUEL[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
Remember when I said I really liked writing Westerns? Loved it so much that I started a series set in Aces and Eight! It's entertaining to reimagine characters into the setting, and best believe I plan on writing more in this series. Save my Soul forever and ever!
[[/div]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[div class="heading"]]
[[=]]
OTHER
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="turbo-block bg-white text-black border-black"]]
[[div class="turbo-block bg-orange"]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]ðŸ“[[/size]]
**[[[departments-complete-list |A SEMI-COMPREHENSIVE LIST OF FOUNDATION DEPARTMENTS]]]**
[[size 75%]]COLLAB[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
Wow, an essay!

I honestly didn't necessarily plan for this to be a thing, I guess? I started working on it, mostly just for myself and some friends. But, out on a whim, I sent it to MAST to get reviewed. [[*user Lt Flops]] came on to help, as a lot of it was based on her old work, and we got it polished, approved, and posted. As of writing, it's still evolving in its format and structure, and I'm still open to any recommendations on how to improve it!
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="heading"]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="turbo-block bg-white text-black border-black"]]
[[div class="turbo-block bg-grey"]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]ðŸ”©[[/size]]
**[[[FORMAT SCREW HUB]]]**
[[size 75%]]COLLAB[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
Like the essay above this, I didn't plan on making this, like, at all. I ended up getting wrapped up in it when [[*user Tstaffor]] came to me for help in getting the [[table]] set up, ended up contributing more code for it, and ended up filling out the -INT and 001 sections! It was a lot of fun, reading a lot of format screws and finding out ways to describe them.
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="heading"]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="turbo-block bg-white text-black border-black"]]
[[div class="turbo-block bg-orange"]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]ðŸ“[[/size]]
**[[[poi-complete-list |A SEMI-COMPREHENSIVE LIST OF PERSONS OF INTEREST]]]**
[[size 75%]]COLLAB[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
Wow, an essay! Again!

I started this one a little bit after I finished the one for Departments. After my (not so quick) hiatus from the wiki I picked it back up and got it into working shape to get put onto the wiki. Shout out to [[*user newnykacolaquantum]] for giving me his blessings to use his original list and put it up onto the site
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/tab]]
[[tab for when i die]]

If I ever get banned/die/go inactive for more than 2 years, then the ownership of my articles will go as follows:
* All co-authored pages will go to their respective collaborators.
* Everything else goes to the community. do what you want with it
* Anything written in a canon goes to the creator of that canon. If that person(s) isn't active anymore, then the articles go to the community or something.
[[/tab]]
[[tab ratings and stuff]]

what do i do for this one uh

+++++ other stuff I've done:

* Made the [[[scp-6170|Draugr]]] esoteric class
 * Item is considered Neutralised or Decommissioned, but ongoing anomalous phenomena originates from them.
* Made the [[[scp-6821|Pudicitia]]] esoteric class
 * Objects that have been negatively affected by Foundation involvement and are now receiving aid from the Foundation.
